Analysis of Trip Advisor data relating to South Australian parks 1 Data exploration 1.1 Summary 1.2 Missing data

Analysis of Trip Advisor data relating to South Australian parks Department for Environment and Water Friday, 26 April, 2019 1 Data exploration 1.1 Summary Between 16/May/2004 and 02/November/2019 there were 3851 responses on Trip Advisor that could be associated with South Australian parks. 1.2 Missing data datMiss <- dat %>% summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.)))) %>% t() %>% data.frame() %>% rownames_to_column() %>% dplyr::rename(column = 1, NAs = 2) %>% dplyr::mutate(per = 100*NAs/nrow(dat) , column = fct_inorder(column) ) Some of the key data fields were left blank in many responses. For example, 1715 (45%) responses did not provide their gender and 1987 (52%) didnâ€™t provide their age. Figure 1.1 shows the percentage of responses that did not provide information against each field. ggplot(datMiss, aes(column,per)) + geom_col() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) + labs(x = "Column" , y = "Percentage of null (NA) cells in each column" ) Figure 1.1: A large proportion of responses did not answer some questions, particularly Gender and Age
